base_layout.translate_context: Base layout elements shared across authentication pages

mfa_sms_page.heading: Setup phone MFA
mfa_sms_page.description: Add a phone number to receive codes by sms
mfa_sms_page.phone_input_error_invalid_region: Number not valid for this region
mfa_sms_page.phone_input_error_invalid_format: Enter only digits without spaces, excluding the leading 0

mfa_email_page.heading: Setup email MFA
mfa_email_page.description: Enter an email for receiving verification codes
mfa_email_page.translate_context: Page for setting up multi-factor authentication using email

index.heading: Welcome to ${business_name}
index.description: There's nothing to see here yet. But an awesome home page is coming soon.
index.translate_context: Landing page after login when no content is available yet

sign_in_page.heading: Welcome back
sign_in_page.description: Enter your email and we'll send a sign in code.

sign_in_page.email_input_error_no_account_found: No account found with this email

sign_in_page.phone_input_error_sms_limit_reached: Can't send code. SMS message service not set up. Sign in using another method.

choose_mfa_method_page.heading: Verify your identity
choose_mfa_method_page.translate_context: Page to choose a preferred MFA method

account_locked_page.heading: Account locked
account_locked_page.description: You've entered an incorrect code too many times and your account has been locked for ${lockout_duration_minutes} minutes
account_locked_page.translate_context: Page shown when a user is locked out due to too many failed attempts

password_setup_page.heading: Password setup
password_setup_page.password_input_error_too_common: That password is quite common. Make it harder to guess.
password_setup_page.password_input_error_too_short: Passwords need to be at least 8 characters
password_setup_page.password_input_error_extra_space: A password can't start or end with a space

password_reset_page.heading: Reset password

recovery_codes_page.heading: Almost there
recovery_codes_page.description: Copy these recovery codes and keep them somewhere safe. You’ll need them if you ever need to sign in without your device.
recovery_codes_page.recovery_codes_page_error_already_viewed: Looks like you've already viewed the recovery codes once, so we can't show them again. If you need help signing in, contact your account admin.
recovery_codes_page.translate_context: Page to display and download recovery codes

subscribe_form_widget.heading: Stay in the loop
subscribe_form_widget.description: Hear from us about product updates, news and events
subscribe_form_widget.translate_context: Widget form to subscribe to updates and news

password_verify_page.heading: Enter your password
password_verify_page.password_input_error_too_short: Passwords need to be at least 8 characters

sms_verify_code_page.heading: Verify phone number
sms_verify_code_page.description: Enter the code we just sent to ${phone_number}
sms_verify_code_page.code_input_error_expired_code: Your confirmation code has expired, please request a new one
sms_verify_code_page.code_input_error_incorrect_code: Please enter a valid confirmation code
sms_verify_code_page.code_input_error_incorrect_code_length: The confirmation code should be 6 digits
sms_verify_code_page.code_input_error_resend_requested_too_so: Cannot send another code just yet. Please try again later
sms_verify_code_page.translate_context: Page to verify SMS-based confirmation code
sms_verify_code_page.description_resent_code: We just sent a new code to ${phone_number}
sms_verify_code_page.description_warning_too_many_incorrect_a: Too many incorrect codes were entered, so we sent a fresh one to ${phone_number}

recovery_code_verify_page.heading: Recovery code
recovery_code_verify_page.description: Enter one of the recovery codes you were provided during your initial sign up.

recovery_code_verify_page.recovery_code_input_error_too_short: Enter a recovery code at least 9 characters long
recovery_code_verify_page.translate_context: Page to enter a recovery code for MFA fallback

verification_code_sms.description:
${generated_code} is your one-time code to sign in to ${business_name}

@${receiver_domain} #${generated_code}
verification_code_sms.translate_context: SMS message content template for sending verification code

choose_organization_page.heading: Where do you want to sign in?
choose_organization_page.translate_context: Page for selecting an organization to sign in to

request_access_page.heading: We’ll keep you updated and send an invitation when access is available
request_access_page.description: We'll keep you updated and let you know when your invitation is ready
request_access_page.success_heading: Thanks for requesting access. We’ve added you to our list and will send updates soon.
request_access_page.success_description: Thanks for requesting access to ${business_name}. We've added you to our subscribers list and will let you know as soon as an invite is available.
request_access_page.translate_context: Page for users to request access to a Kinde tenant

email_address_verification_email.email_body:
Hi there,
Please use the code below to confirm your email address and continue on ${business_name}. This code will expire in ${expiration_duration}. If you don't think you should be receiving this email, you can safely ignore it.
email_address_verification_email.email_preview: Please use the code below to confirm your email address and continue on ${business_name}
email_address_verification_email.email_disclaimer: You received this email because you requested a confirmation code from ${business_name}
email_address_verification_email.organization_not_found: The organisation you are trying to sign in to does not exist.
email_address_verification_email.invitation_already_accepted: This invitation is no longer valid. It has either expired or has already been accepted.
email_address_verification_email.translate_context: Email template for sending verification code

general_errors.heading: Error
general_errors.action_allowed_only_once: The requested action could only be executed once.
general_errors.no_organization_access: Sorry, you do not have access to this organisation.
general_errors.operation_not_permitted: The requested action could not be completed.
general_errors.invitation_email_mismatch: That email address doesn’t seem quite right. You’ll need to sign in using the email address the invitation was sent to.
general_errors.email_domain_not_allowed: We can’t finish signing you up as the email domain we detected is not allowed. Try a different sign up method.
general_errors.invitation_expired: Looks like you waited a bit long to accept and your invitation expired. Ask your admin to invite you again.
general_errors.user_suspended: You cannot sign in at the moment
general_errors.unknown_error: Something went wrong when we tried to authenticate you, and we can’t offer a quick way out. Start a new session and try signing in again.
general_errors.organization_not_found: The organization you are trying to sign in to does not exist.
general_errors.invitation_already_accepted: This invitation is no longer valid. It has either expired or has already been accepted.
general_errors.login_link_expired: This link has expired. Please go back to our login page to sign in again.
general_errors.organization_connection_not_allowed: Access to this organization requires a different authentication method.
general_errors.email_missing: We were unable to obtain your email address from the identity provider.
general_errors.email_has_existing_username_identity: The email address provided already has a username associated with it.
general_errors.invitation_disabled: Invitations are not currently being accepted.
general_errors.organization_suspended: The organization you are trying to sign in to has been suspended.

account_not_found_page.heading: We can’t find your account
account_not_found_page.description: We just need a few more details to finalise your account.
account_not_found_page.description_sign_ups_disabled: Try using a different account or sign-in option
account_not_found_page.description_social: Do you want to create a new one with your ${social_provider_name} account?
account_not_found_page.description_credential: Do you want to create a new account with ${credential} now?

account_not_found_page.password_input_error_extra_space: A password can't start or end with a space
account_not_found_page.disclaimer_clickwrap_error_required: You must read and accept the policies to continue
account_not_found_page.translate_context: Page shown when no account is found during sign-in

continue_with_sso_page.heading: Continue with SSO
